page.title: 04CHURCHES & CHAPELS
page.content: If you go down Chapel Lane you will find a private residence which used to be the old village Methodist Chapel. Totley Rise Methodist Church at the bottom of the hill has a Sunday School, Youth Group, and meets the needs of the more mature too.Not far away in Totley Brook Road is Dore & Totley U.R.C. Church, another lively church with extensive premises.All Saints' C. of E. Church in the older part of the village has a beautiful building with an unusual short tower which has a pitched roof. All Saints'C.of E. Primary School is closely linked to this church and holds school services in it on festival days and at other times. The R. C. Chapel of Ease of the English Martyrs is on Baslow Road,next to the Green and the old pump.
